name: Adventure Genre
description: Exploration and discovery with epic journeys, exotic locations, and thrilling quests

prompt.base: Adventure atmosphere, epic scale, exotic locations, dynamic action, exploration mood, vast landscapes, heroic journey, discovery elements, thrilling composition, cinematic grandeur
prompt.positive: epic landscapes, exotic locations, dynamic movement, adventurous spirit, vast horizons, dramatic skies, heroic poses, exploration energy, cinematic scale, natural wonders, journey atmosphere, discovery moments
prompt.negative: confined spaces, static composition, mundane settings, domestic interiors, office environments, urban monotony, sedentary scenes, claustrophobic framing

technical.lighting: Natural dramatic lighting, golden hour, epic skies
technical.composition: Wide establishing shots, dynamic angles, sense of scale

variations.modifier: dense vegetation, tropical atmosphere, hidden temples, wildlife, humid environment, lush greens

variations.name: Desert Adventure
variations.modifier: vast sand dunes, harsh sunlight, ancient ruins, survival elements, warm color palette

variations.name: Mountain Adventure
variations.modifier: towering peaks, treacherous terrain, alpine beauty, climbing action, dramatic elevation

examples: An explorer standing at the edge of a vast canyon, dramatic sunset lighting, epic scale, sense of discovery and wonder
